name: Cheesy Chicken Noodle Bowl
description: A simple and comforting meal combining the classic flavors of chicken, noodles, and cheese.
instructions: Boil the instant noodles according to package instructions.
Slice the cooked chicken breast into thin pieces.
Fry a small amount of vegetable oil in a pan.
Add the sliced chicken and cook until slightly browned.
Drain the boiled noodles and add them to the pan with the chicken.
Mix well and season with salt and pepper.
Grate the cheese over the top before serving.
